alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Salt Lake...western Utah and east central Tooele Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 929 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ophir, or 11 miles southeast of Tooele, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Herriman, Bluffdale, Ophir, Camp Williams, Millcreek, Kearns, Magna and Oquirrh. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 294 and 303. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
